content.description: Consider the following data field and method.
content.question: private int[] seq; // precondition: seq.length > 0 public int lenIncreasing() { int k = 1; while ((k < seq.length) && (seq[k - 1] < seq[k])) { k++; } // assertion return k; } Which of the following assertions is true when execution reaches the line // assertion in lenIncreasing?

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
